issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4. Problem Description
We are getting this error at times which says 'Javascript execution exceeded timeout' while testing on blackberry device. 
The same works fine on the browser in the desktop. 

h4. Actual Results
Error on bb's browser saying 'Javascript execution exceeded timeout'

h4. Expected Results
The bb version working fine.

h4. Test Case.
1. Use a BB 9860.
2. Open the browser and type the url included in private comment. 
3. Use login/pass from the private comment. 
4. Once you launch the app using the url, login using the credentials, sometimes this error occurs while launching the app itself. 
5. once logged in, if you are prompted with the security questions, type 'quincy' for all the questions.
6. now click continue
7. you can see the home page with a plan.
8. click on the plan (that is when we are seeing this error all the time, we are not able to go beyond this window )


h4. Extra info 
We are testing on Blackberry 9860 (v7.0 Bundle 1950). Also, we are testing with wifi,with remote server.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Javascript execution timeout error on Mobileweb
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version: 2.1GA 
Platform & version: Mobile Web in Blackberry 9860 (v7.0 Bundle 1950)
Device Details: Blackberry 9860 (v7.0 Bundle 1950)
Host Operating System: OS X 10.7.3
Titanium Studio version: 2.0.2

comments.body: Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
